sentences.en: A centimeter can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 一厘米可以无穷尽地分成更小的单位。

sentences.en: Common units of volume are cubic centimeter.
sentences.cn: 常见的体积单位是立方厘米.

sentences.en: Configuration feature: Celadon is erect and herbaceous, tall 15 - 60 centimeter.
sentences.cn: 形态特征: 灰绿色竖立草本, 高 15-60 厘米.

sentences.en: Human brains have more than 100 million cells per cubic centimeter.
sentences.cn: 人脑每立方厘米有一亿多个细胞.

sentences.en: Pork, fresh mushrooms and wash, and cut half a centimeter square Xiaoding.
sentences.cn: 五花肉 、 鲜香菇洗净切成半厘米见方的小丁.

sentences.en: The body has a 3 centimeter margin ( on all sides ).
sentences.cn: 主体部分的四条边上包含了宽为3厘米的 边界.

sentences.en: The centimeter - gram - second electromagnetic unit of inductance, equal to one billionth a henry.
sentences.cn: 电磁亨利厘米 - 克 -秒 制中感应系数的电磁单位, 相当于一亨利的十亿分之一.

sentences.en: The centimeter - gram - second electromagnetic unit of magnetomotive force , equal to ampere - turn.
sentences.cn: 吉伯厘米 - 克 -秒 磁动势电磁单位, 等于!

sentences.en: The centimeter is one - tenth of the decimeter or one - hundredth of the meter.
sentences.cn: 厘米是分米的 十分之一.或者说是米的百分之一.

sentences.en: The centimeter is the fundamentalunit of length in the centimeter - gram - second system.
sentences.cn: 米在C. G. S. 公制中为一种长度的基本单位.

sentences.en: The measuring unit of torque wrench is pound - inch or kilogram - centimeter.
sentences.cn: 力矩扳手的计量单位为镑 - 寸或者公斤 - 厘米.

sentences.en: The pressure maintained in the water main is two kilogram per square centimeter.
sentences.cn: 自来水总管里的水压保持为2公斤/平方厘米.

sentences.en: The scale of this map is one centimeter to the kilometer.
sentences.cn: 这个地图的比例是用一厘米代表一公里。

sentences.en: The scientist calculated the number of atoms in a cubic centimeter of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 科学家算出了每1立方厘米氧中原子的数量.

sentences.en: This kind of unusual elephant feather same material length approximately 0.8 centimeter.
sentences.cn: 这种奇特的像羽毛一样的物质长度约0.8厘米.

sentences.en: Unfortunately some writers have used bar for one dyne per square centimeter.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是,有些作家错误地使用压力单位“巴”,把一巴错用成了每平方厘米一达因.

sentences.en: With the profile of a dinosaur and the texture of a rose bush, a thorny devil in Alice Springs Desert Park looks like trouble, but this slow-moving, six-inch [15-centimeter] lizard eats only ants.
sentences.cn: 长着恐龙的外形和一身的刺犹如一丛玫瑰，这样一个棘手的恶魔在阿丽斯春天的沙漠公园里看似麻烦，但他动作缓慢，六英寸[15厘米]蜥蜴只吃蚂蚁。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 平方厘米，平方公分
